column4: ok I am trying to play diablo 2  but everything looks ok till the game menu when it should start it says input signle out of range any ideas on how to fix?
run it in a virtual desktop
but change the resolution of the desktop to something your screens can handle, obviously
I use compiz to zoom in once it's loaded. And remember you'll want to turn off compiz's move plugin otherwise when you press alt (to see loot) you'll end up moving the screen
